QuestData.Title: The Harborage
QuestData.Description: Anchorite Avuun is one of our uncorrupted brethren, what other races know as Draenei. He came to The Harborage to heal us, and try to find a cure. It is he who sent me here to collect these crystals.$B$BHe watches over a very sick friend now... and despite sending word to the Exodar itself, he has not found any aid so far. Could you bring these crystals to him, $n? You may be the only one able to assist him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Draenethyst Crystals to Anchorite Avuun.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $c. I am afraid it may be too late... but I refuse to give up, even if the Exodar itself does not hear my cries.
